snippet: Family and friends bid farewell at a North Carolina church on Saturday to Thomas Eric Duncan, the Liberian who was the first person to die of Ebola in the United States.
abstract: Family and friends gather at North Carolina church for funeral service of Thomas Eric Duncan, Liberian man who was the first person to die of Ebola in the United States.

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez contributed reporting from Dallas, and Jack Healy from Houston.

lead_paragraph: Family and friends bid farewell at a North Carolina church on Saturday to Thomas Eric Duncan, the Liberian who was the first person to die of Ebola in the United States.

headline.main: At Service for Dallas Ebola Victim, Relatives Recall a Gentle, Generous Man
headline.print_headline: At Service for Dallas Ebola Victim, Relatives Recall a Gentle, Generous Man
